Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Effect of alkylxanthines on gentamicin - induced acute renal failure in the rat .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| acute renal failure |

The disease entity in the paragraph is "acute renal failure". It is a medical condition characterized by the sudden loss of kidney function, which can lead to the accumulation of waste products in the body. In this case, the renal failure is said to be "gentamicin-induced," indicating that it was caused by the administration of the antibiotic gentamicin.

The only disease entity in the paragraph is "acute renal failure". The term "gentamicin-induced" is not a disease, but rather a description of the cause of the renal failure. Therefore, it should not be included as a separate disease entity.
